venue.name: Emerson Umbrella Center for the Arts

item.description:
The Sounds of Concord and the University of Newcastle Chamber Choir present: The Show of Champions!

Sounds of Concord is the 2011 Barbershop Harmony Society Northeastern District Champion chorus. The Show of Champions is a send-off show for Sounds of Concord, who is preparing for the International Barbershop Chorus Competition this summer in Portland, Oregon.

The University of Newcastle Chamber Choir is the 2010 World Choir Games Champion. They are preparing to defend their title this year in Cincinnati.



HEADLINING QUARTETS:

Downtown Crossing (DTX) is the 2011 Northeastern District Silver Medalists and ranked #1 entering the 2012 competition.

Testostertones are the 2012 Patriot Division Champions.



TICKETING INFORMATION:

Contact any Sounds of Concord Member to Purchase tickets! Each sale goes to support the International Competition travel fund.

Also, tix@soundsofconcord.org or 866-537-1584

General Admission - $20.
Reserved Seating - $25. (First 5 rows - Center)


VENUE DETAILS:

Saturday June 23, 2012, 7:30 PM
Emerson Umbrella Theater
40 Stow Street, Concord, MA



This unique performance is a benefit for the Sounds of Concord International Contest Travel Fund. Sounds of Concord is a 501(c)(3) non-profit organization

group.name: Boston Area Acapella Barbershop Quartet/Chorus Singing

item.name: International Show of Champions
